Enchantment 6

Dome of Solid Air
Ritual
A5
spell id [id]: 928
effect number [effect_number]: 84
damage [damage]: 61
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 20A
Local Enchant Province - Permanent Duration:Dome of Solid Air
Dispelled if province changes owners :1
Hidden Enchantment :1
A dome made out of air is created over the entire province the mage is in. The dome will protect the province from many spells that originate outside the warded province. While undisturbed, the spell will last indefinitely, but if a spell passes through the dome, or if the mage who cast the dome dies, it will shatter instantly.
Dome Protection 80%. Destroyed if it fails to block a spell. Friendly spells will also be blocked.
